Notes.Text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-3154: Fixed out-of-bounds array write due to invalid VerticesPerRow (bsc#1240687).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Out-of-bounds array write in Xpdf 4.05 and earlier, triggered by an invalid VerticesPerRow value in a PDF shading dictionary.
